Title: Powershell Automated POODLE Check & Remediation
Description: This project is aimed at providing a simple way to check and mitigate against the POODLE SSL 3.0 vulnerability in an automated fashion.
HomeWiki:
Automated POODLE Check & Fix for Windows Server 2008 and above & Windows Vista and above

 

Synopsis:

  • This project is aiming to provide a quick way for win sys admins & IT security conscious users to mitigate against the POODLE SSL 3.0 vulnerability. 

 

Instructions:

  1. Deploy this script to the Windows machine that needs to be checked or mitigated
  2. Run as administrator from the powershell console
  3. Check the console for any messages that may suggest an error and follow the steps listed in the console to mitigate.
